ValidationRule.description: For Free Trials, validate that agreement has been accepted by customer before moving to closed, ready to ship, closed won
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( $User.Id != '0051a000002JKtR', ISPICKVAL(Type,"Free Trial Opportunity"), OR ( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closing"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Orders Processing"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Ready to Ship"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won") ), AND ( Trial_Agreement_Accepted__c = False, NOT($Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "Finance")), $Profile.Name <> "Order Operations Admin" ), of_Serialized_Products__c > 0, Cable_Send_Only__c = False )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure the customer accepts the Free Trial Agreement before moving the opportunity to Closing or Ready to Ship or Closed Won
